00026 #ifndef SDBX_BTREE_VERIFY_H
00027 #define SDBX_BTREE_VERIFY_H

00029 #include <vector>

00032 __BTREE_TEMPLATE_DEFN
00033 bool BTree<__BTREE_TEMPLATE_FN>::Verify()
00034 {
00035         uint64_t leaf_count = 0;
00036 
00037         if (backend.m_treeHeight)
00038         {
00039                 std::vector<IdType>                     id;
00040                 std::vector<std::size_t>        idx;
00041                 std::vector<bool>                       idx_is_end;
00042                 std::vector<KeyType>            keys;
00043                 
00044                 // reduce allocations
00045                 id.reserve(backend.m_treeHeight);
00046                 idx.reserve(backend.m_treeHeight);
00047                 idx_is_end.reserve(backend.m_treeHeight);
00048                 keys.reserve(backend.m_treeHeight);
00049                 
00050                 // initialize the stack
00051                 id.push_back(backend.m_rootId);
00052                 idx.push_back(0);
00053                 idx_is_end.push_back(false);
00054         
00055                 // this could be recursive, but that would be so much easier! :)
00056                 while (!id.empty())
00057                 {
00058                         if (id.size() < backend.m_treeHeight)
00059                         {
00060                                 Node * node = backend.get_node(id.back());
00061                                 std::size_t cur_idx = idx.back();
00062                                 
00063                                 if (node->items.size() == 0)
00064                                 {
00065                                         assert(0 && "verify failure type 0");
00066                                         return false;
00067                                 }
00068                                 
00069                                 if (cur_idx <= node->items.size())
00070                                 {
00071                                         // perform a check on each node when you initially enter it
00072                                         if (cur_idx == 0) 
00073                                         {
00074                                                 if (!std::is_sorted(node->items.begin(), node->items.end()))
00075                                                 {
00076                                                         assert(0 && "verify failure type 1a");
00077                                                         return false;
00078                                                 }
00079 
00080                                                 if (keys.size() > 0 && 
00081                                                         !*(idx_is_end.end()-2) && 
00082                                                         keys.back() < node->items.back().key)
00083                                                 {
00084                                                         assert(0 && "verify failure type 1b");
00085                                                         return false;
00086                                                 }
00087                                         }
00088 
00089                                         if (idx.back()++ == node->items.size())
00090                                         {
00091                                                 // then traverse down the last id in our set
00092                                                 id.push_back(node->end_id);
00093                                                 idx_is_end.back() = true;
00094                                                 keys.push_back(KeyType());
00095                                         }
00096                                         else
00097                                         {
00098                                                 // otherwise iterate over all nodes
00099                                                 id.push_back(node->items[idx.back()-1].id);
00100                                                 keys.push_back(node->items[idx.back()-1].key);
00101                                         }
00102                                         
00103                                         idx.push_back(0);
00104                                         if (id.size() < backend.m_treeHeight)
00105                                                 idx_is_end.push_back(false);
00106                                         continue;
00107                                 }
00108                         }
00109                         else
00110                         {
00111                                 // at a leaf
00112                                 LeafNode * leaf = backend.get_leaf_node(id.back());
00113                                 
00114                                 if (!idx_is_end.back() && keys.back() < leaf->items.back().key )
00115                                 {
00116                                         assert(0 && "verify failure type 2a");
00117                                         return false;
00118                                 }
00119                                 
00120                                 if (!std::is_sorted(leaf->items.begin(), leaf->items.end()))
00121                                 {
00122                                         assert(0 && "verify failure type 2b");
00123                                         return false;
00124                                 }
00125                                 
00126                                 leaf_count += leaf->items.size();
00127                         }
00128                         
00129 
00130                         // go up a level
00131                         
00132                         if (id.size() < backend.m_treeHeight) idx_is_end.pop_back();
00133                                                 
00134                         id.pop_back();
00135                         idx.pop_back();
00136 
00137                         if (keys.size())
00138                         {
00139                                 keys.pop_back();
00140                                 assert(keys.size() == idx.size()-1);
00141                         }
00142 
00143                         assert(id.size() == idx.size());
00144                         assert(idx.size() == idx_is_end.size());
00145                         
00146                 }
00147         }
00148 
00149         if (leaf_count != GetItemCount())
00150         {
00151                 assert(0 && "verify failure type 3");
00152                 return false;
00153         }
00154 
00155         return true;
00156 }

00159 #endif
